text:
We ordered Hoshino @ United Square through Grab. When the food arrived, we were eager to tuck in to a hearty meal!

Oh but what a disappointment greeted us!

The moment we opened the cover of the lobster bisque, the rancid smell punched us in the nose with my reaction wanting to puke!ğŸ¤®ğŸ¤®ğŸ¤®

Then we quickly opened up the rest of the order which seemed ok except the mille crepe which seemed to have melted (??)! Our house is jus 2 bus stops or 5 min away from United Square!

This is definitely a great letdown!

Havenâ€™t been back for a while but my girl was craving for her soft shell crab aglio olio ğŸ˜… which she devoured within 10 min ğŸ˜³ and only gave me a tiny bit to try ğŸ˜‚ so definitely they were on point with that!! ğŸ‘ğŸ»

However, I was quite disappointed with my steak as it was perhaps not the best cut as there were some stringy parts and some parts were too tough though doneness was medium-well ğŸ˜–

Ordered the anniversary set so both of us ordered the fruit tea as we really like the fruits in there. Dessert was the Hazelnut pancake with a scope of icecream. I really liked the chocolate ganache actually ğŸ˜…

Overall, they were prompt to service when we pressed the bell ğŸ‘ğŸ» Will be back but Iâ€™ll skip the steak next time ğŸ™„ğŸ’”

Been reading the other reviews about bad service, guess I was fortunate to receive good service during my visit. It was a Saturday afternoon during lunch, hardly much crowd. Enjoyed the Premium Wagyu with Omurice and their Salt Caramel and Banana French Toast.

We came on a late Saturday morning and ordered a Katsu Omu Souffle Curry Rice with Salad and Mini Soup combo, Orihime Blend and Hoshino Blend.

The Katsu was crispy on the outside and surprisingly I liked their salad as well. Loved their Orihime Blend, preferred it black. It's indeed light-bodied and mild with a clean taste laced with biscuity flavor. Hoshino Blend on the other hand is richer and smooth, goes better with a dash of milk.
Orihime is my personal favourite and I even joked that I want to bring it home.

Service was what I would expect from a restaurant which was decent.

I would come back again.

We enjoyed our lunch here a lot. Orders the set lunch for 2. Everything tasted delicious. Can taste the cookâ€™s effort in making them. Pasta was to my liking, no so creamy and not so bland. I didnâ€™t even like omu rice, but I like this one. The desert was a bless. The different ingredients blend in nicely. We were so full at the end but still insist to finish everything. The only thing can do with improvement was staffâ€™s recommendation when we ordered. A bit confusingâ€¦
